load_recipes.name: positive_g_main_wing_lift
load_recipes.location: Applied along main-wing quarter-chord line x = x_LE(y) + 0.25*c(y), for -b/2 <= y <= +b/2.
load_recipes.notes: Total lift set to L = n_pos * W (n_pos=2.5). Use elliptic L'(y) ∝ sqrt(1-(2y/b)^2).

load_recipes.name: negative_g_main_wing_lift
load_recipes.location: Applied along main-wing quarter-chord line x = x_LE(y) + 0.25*c(y), for -b/2 <= y <= +b/2.
load_recipes.notes: Total lift set to L = n_neg * W (n_neg=-1.0). Negative indicates downward aerodynamic resultant.

load_recipes.name: rolling_antisymmetric_lift_right
load_recipes.location: Right semi-span only: applied along quarter-chord line for 0 <= y <= +b/2.
load_recipes.notes: Use a selected roll load factor n_roll (often n_roll = n_pos for worst-case rolling pull). Right semi-span carries (1+k_roll) share; elliptic distribution on the right semispan.

load_recipes.name: rolling_antisymmetric_lift_left
load_recipes.location: Left semi-span only: applied along quarter-chord line for -b/2 <= y <= 0.
load_recipes.notes: Use a selected roll load factor n_roll. Left semi-span carries (1-k_roll) share; elliptic distribution on the left semispan.

load_recipes.name: aileron_induced_torsion_outboard
load_recipes.magnitude_N_or_Nm: T_ail(V,delta_a)  # compute from hinge moment + lift increment offset to shear center
load_recipes.location: Outboard region only: y_boom < |y| <= b/2, applied about wing shear center / elastic axis.
load_recipes.notes: Use for outboard wing torsion box sizing. If you do not yet compute T_ail, bound it conservatively.

load_recipes.name: aileron_hinge_actuator_load_local
load_recipes.magnitude_N_or_Nm: H = q_inf * S_a * c_a * C_h  # hinge moment
load_recipes.location: Aileron hinge line near rear spar (~70–80% chord), at hinge stations and actuator hardpoint.
load_recipes.notes: Use for bracket, horn, hinge fastener pull-through, and local rib reinforcement sizing.

load_recipes.name: tail_download_to_boom_joints
load_recipes.magnitude_N_or_Nm: H_t = q_inf * S_t * C_Lt ;  M_joint ~= H_t * x_tail
load_recipes.location: Applied at boom–wing joints at y = ±0.8534 m (approx), as vertical shear + pitch moment couple.
load_recipes.notes: Tail loads act on booms and are reacted at wing joints. Evaluate both maximum tail download and maximum tail upload.

load_recipes.name: battery_inertia_vertical_inboard
load_recipes.location: Between-booms region: |y| <= 0.8534 m, applied at battery bay centroid (use quarter-chord unless better known).
load_recipes.notes: Inertial load on structure for +n_z acts downward. Used n_batt_vert=2.5.

load_recipes.name: battery_inertia_longitudinal_inboard
load_recipes.location: Between-booms region: |y| <= 0.8534 m, applied at battery bay centroid.
load_recipes.notes: Forward (+x) if n_x positive; set sign per your acceleration/braking convention. Used n_batt_long=0.5.

load_recipes.name: battery_inertia_lateral_inboard
load_recipes.location: Between-booms region: |y| <= 0.8534 m, applied at battery bay centroid.
load_recipes.notes: Right (+y) if n_y positive; set sign per your yaw/sideslip convention. Used n_batt_lat=0.5.

load_recipes.name: ground_support_rest
load_recipes.location: Applied as upward normal reactions at actual ground contact points (booms/skids/belly/tail bumper), summing to W.
load_recipes.notes: Static support case. Use n_ground_support=1.0. Wing only sees this indirectly through structure.

load_recipes.name: ground_impact_recovery
load_recipes.location: Applied as upward impact reaction(s) at first-contact point(s); include asymmetric variant (one side first).
load_recipes.notes: Pick n_ground_impact based on recovery method. Used n_ground_impact=3.0.
